channel.title: Test on 学无止境
channel.description: Recent content in Test on 学无止境

item.title: 函数进行单元测试
item.description: 单个函数进行测试 示例 def delRepeat(data, key): """Return delete repeat dict >>> delRepeat([{"id": 1, "value": 2}, {"id": 1, "value": 2}, {"id": 2, "value": 3}], "id") [{'id': 1, 'value': 2}, {'id': 2, 'value': 3}] """ new_data = [] values = [] for d in data: if d[key] not in values: new_data.append(d) values.append(d[key]) return new_data 执行 python3 -m doctest xxx.py 若无错误提示则通过 方式二 def delRepeat(data, key): """Return delete repeat dict """ new_data = [] values = [] for d in data: if d[key] not in values: new_data.
